name: Potential Persistence Via GlobalFlags
description: Detects registry persistence technique using the GlobalFlags and SilentProcessExit keys
author: Karneades, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Florian Roth

detection.query:
selection_global_flag: {"TargetObject|contains|all": ["\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\", "\\Image File Execution Options\\", "\\GlobalFlag"]}
selection_silent_process: {"TargetObject|contains|all": ["\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\", "\\SilentProcessExit\\"], "TargetObject|contains": ["\\ReportingMode", "\\MonitorProcess"]}
